documents.document: @TransLink The driver on the same bus was yelling at people on the street. I did not feel safe.
.@TransLink I can't ignore that my body is consistently a target for others' aggression, racism, sexism, resentment/entitlement, etc.
As I followed a line of ppl getting on the bus, a man just pushed me off and told me to get out of the way @TransLink
